article_title: As Yankees Open Camp, Shiny Surface Masks What Lies Beneath
article_text:
While the Yankees sat at home last October, their little brothers roared into the World Series on the shoulders of four dynamic starting pitchers all under the age of 28. But the Mets couldn’t overcome the Kansas City Royals, the embodiment of a small-market franchise, who relied on speed and defense to win their second straight American League pennant and their first championship in three decades.

The Mets and Royals, arguably the best teams in baseball, entered 2015 with a combined payroll of approximately $215 million....

twitter.description: As Yankees open spring training, questions about Rodriguez, Teixeira, Tanaka, Beltran hang over team.
twitter.creator: @jareddiamond

image.alt: The Yanks are too old to survive! No, they’re too young to win now!Here’s a spring preview

article_summary:
The Mets and Royals, arguably the best teams in baseball, entered 2015 with a combined payroll of approximately $215 million....
While the Yankees sat at home last October, their little brothers roared into the World Series on the shoulders of four dynamic starting pitchers all under the age of 28.
But the Mets couldn’t overcome the Kansas City Royals, the embodiment of a small-market franchise, who relied on speed and defense to win their second straight American League pennant and their first championship in three decades.
